narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language
lang.label: @xml:lang
lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

lang.name: language

lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

description_type.name: type
description_type.label: @type
description_type.hover_text:
Activity description types. (General, objectives, etc)
Following are the description types:
1. General - Unstructured, long description of the activity
2. Objectives - Specific objectives for the activity, e.g. taken from logical framework
3. Target Groups - Details of groups that are intended to benefit from the activity
4. Other - For miscellaneous use. A further classification or breakdown may be included in the narrative.
For more information

narrative.hover_text: The free text name or description of the item being described. This can be repeated in multiple languages. For more information

lang.name: language

lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

code.name: activity_status
code.label: @code
code.hover_text: An IATI code defining the current status of the activity. This attribute is required. For more information

date_type.name: type
date_type.label: @type
date_type.hover_text: An IATI code defining the type of activity date being reported. This attribute is required. For more information

iso-date.name: date
iso-date.label: @iso-date
iso-date.hover_text:
This attribute is required. This value must be of type xsd:date.
11.1.2: The planned start date of the activity must be before the planned end date.
11.1.3: The actual start date of the activity must be before the actual end date.
11.1.4: The actual start date of the activity must not be in the future.
11.1.5: The actual end date of the activity must not be in the future. For more information

code.name: activity_scope
code.label: @code
code.hover_text: The geographical scope. See IATI codelist for values.This attribute is required.This value must be of type xsd:string. For more information

code.name: country_code
code.label: @code
code.hover_text: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the country. This attribute is required. For more information

percentage.name: percentage
percentage.label: @percentage
percentage.hover_text: The percentage of total commitments or total activity budget to this item. Content must be a decimal number between 0 and 100 inclusive, with no percentage sign. Percentages for all reported countries and regions within a vocabulary MUST add up to 100. For more information

vocabulary.name: region_vocabulary
vocabulary.label: @vocabulary
vocabulary.hover_text: An IATI code for the vocabulary from which the region code is drawn. If it is not present 1 - ‘OECD DAC’ is assumed. For more information

oecd_region_code.name: region_code
oecd_region_code.label: @code
oecd_region_code.hover_text: Either an OECD DAC or UN region code. Codelist is determined by vocabulary attribute. For more information

region_code.name: custom_code
region_code.label: @code
region_code.hover_text: Either an OECD DAC or UN region code. Codelist is determined by vocabulary attribute. For more information

vocabulary-uri.name: vocabulary_uri
vocabulary-uri.label: @vocabulary-uri
vocabulary-uri.hover_text: The URI where this vocabulary is defined. If the vocabulary is 99 (reporting organisation), the URI where this internal vocabulary is defined. For more information

vocabulary.name: policymarker_vocabulary
vocabulary.label: @vocabulary
vocabulary.hover_text: An IATI code for the vocabulary to be used to define policy markers. If omitted then the OECD DAC vocabulary is assumed. For more information

vocabulary-uri.label: @vocabulary-uri
vocabulary-uri.hover_text: If the vocabulary is 99 (reporting organisation), the URI where this internal vocabulary is defined. For more information

significance.name: significance
significance.label: @significance
significance.hover_text: An OECD DAC CRS code indicating the significance of the policy marker for this activity. This attribute MUST be used for all OECD DAC CRS vocabularies. For more information

policy_marker_code.name: policy_marker
policy_marker_code.label: @code
policy_marker_code.hover_text: A policy marker code from the codelist specified in the vocabulary. This attribute is required. For more information

policy_marker_text.name: policy_marker_text
policy_marker_text.label: @code
policy_marker_text.hover_text: A policy marker code from the codelist specified in the vocabulary. This attribute is required. For more information

code.name: collaboration_type
code.label: @code
code.hover_text: A code from the OECD DAC CRS “Bi_Multi” codelist. For more information

code.name: default_flow_type
code.label: @code
code.hover_text: A code from the OECD DAC CRS “Type of flow” codelist. This attribute is required. For more information

code.name: default_finance_type
code.label: @code
code.hover_text: A code from the OECD DAC CRS “Type of finance” codelist. This attribute is required. For more information

vocabulary.label: @vocabulary
vocabulary.name: default_aidtype_vocabulary
vocabulary.hover_text: A code for the vocabulary aid-type classifications. If omitted the AidType (OECD DAC) codelist is assumed. The code must be a valid value in the AidTypeVocabulary codelist. For more information

default_aid_type_code.label: @code
default_aid_type_code.name: default_aid_type
default_aid_type_code.hover_text: A code from the specified vocabulary. This attribute is required. For more information

earmarking_category_code.label: @code
earmarking_category_code.name: earmarking_category
earmarking_category_code.hover_text: A code from the specified vocabulary. This attribute is required. For more information

earmarking_modality_code.label: @code
earmarking_modality_code.name: earmarking_modality
earmarking_modality_code.hover_text: A code from the specified vocabulary. This attribute is required. For more information

cash_and_voucher_modalities_code.label: @code
cash_and_voucher_modalities_code.name: cash_and_voucher_modalities
cash_and_voucher_modalities_code.hover_text: A code from the specified vocabulary. This attribute is required. For more information

code.name: default_tied_status
code.label: @code
code.hover_text: An IATI code interpreting the usage of Columns 36-38 of the CRS++ reporting format. (Amount tied, Amount partially untied, Amount tied). For more information

vocabulary.name: country_budget_vocabulary
vocabulary.label: @vocabulary
vocabulary.hover_text: An IATI code for the common functional classification or country system (This allows for common codes, country-specific, or any other classification agreed between countries and donors). For more information

code_text.name: code_text
code_text.label: @code
code_text.hover_text: A code for the budget-item from the vocabulary specified. This attribute is required. For more information

code.name: code
code.label: @code
code.hover_text: A code for the budget-item from the vocabulary specified. This attribute is required. For more information

percentage.name: percentage
percentage.label: @percentage
percentage.hover_text: When multiple budget-item elements are declared within a single country-budget-items element, then, for each vocabulary used, the percentage values should sum 100%. For more information

vocabulary.name: vocabulary
vocabulary.label: @vocabulary
vocabulary.hover_text: A code for a recognised vocabulary of terms classifying the event or action. This attribute is required. For more information

vocabulary-uri.name: vocabulary_uri
vocabulary-uri.label: @vocabulary-uri
vocabulary-uri.hover_text: A u.r.i. for the vocabulary specified which provides access to the list of codes and descriptions. For more information

code.name: code
code.label: @code

lang.hover_text: A code specifying the language of text in this element. It is recommended that wherever possible only codes from ISO 639-1 are used. If not present, the default language is assumed. For more information

percentage.name: capital_spend
percentage.label: @percentage
percentage.hover_text: The percentage of the total commitment allocated to or planned for capital expenditure. Content must be a decimal number between 0 and 100 inclusive, with no percentage sign. For more information

reference.name: activity_identifier
reference.label: @ref
reference.hover_text: A valid activity identifier (as defined in iati-activity/iati-identifier).

activity_type.name: relationship_type
activity_type.label: @type
activity_type.hover_text: An IATI code for the type of relationship

attached.name: condition_attached
attached.label: @attached
attached.hover_text: A yes/no (1/0) value stating whether there are conditions attached to the activity. It is strongly recommended that this attribute is reported, even if there are no conditions attached (i.e. attached=”0”)

condition_type.name: condition_type
condition_type.label: @type
condition_type.hover_text: An IATI code defining the type of condition.

name_attribute.label: @name
name_attribute.hover_text: The original field name in the reporting organisation’s system
